title: Get started
text: Install GitHub web site using devtools package Alternatively can also install R-universe
code: install.packages(devtools) devtools::install_github("pr2database/metapr2-shiny") # Enable repository from pr2database options(repos = c(   pr2database = 'https://pr2database.r-universe.dev',   CRAN = 'https://cloud.r-project.org'))  # Download and install metapr2 in R install.packages('metapr2')

what: Stop and relaunch the Shiny application
title: Get started
text: Hit Disconnect button top left panel.

title: Get started
text: Hit Disconnect button top left panel. Relaunch run_app()

title: Get started
text: Vaulot, D., Sim, C.W.H., Ong, D., Teo, B., Biwer, C., Jamy, M., Lopes dos Santos, ., 2022. metaPR\(^{2}\): database eukaryotic 18S rRNA metabarcodes emphasis protists. Molecular Ecology Resources 22, 3188–3201. https://doi.org/10.1111/1755-0998.13674

title: Barplots
text: Fig. 2: Barplot interactive. Right: isolating specific group.

title: Barplots
text: Time series can also plotted data aggregated : year (Fig. 3) month (Fig. 4) day test feature best use single dataset (e.g. Spanish Blanes Giner et al. 2019) use single size fraction. Using zoom function plotly, one can easily display monthly daily data (Fig. 4). Fig. 3: Barplot time series year aggregation Fig. 4: Barplot time series month aggregation. Right: zooming

title: Barplots
text: Sommeria-Klein, G., Watteaux, R., Ibarbalz, F.M., Pierella Karlusich, J.J., Iudicone, D., Bowler, C., Morlon, H., 2021. Global drivers eukaryotic plankton biogeography sunlit ocean. Science 374, 594–599. https://doi.org/10.1126/science.abb3717 Giner, C.R., Balagué, V., Krabberød, .K., Ferrera, ., Reñé, ., Garcés, E., Gasol, J.M., Logares, R., Massana, R., 2019. Quantifying long-term recurrence planktonic microbial eukaryotes. Molecular Ecology 28, 923–935. https://doi.org/10.1111/mec.14929

title: Data processing
text: Raw fastq files downloaded NCBI author web site deposited NCBI datasets processed cutapdapt (Martin et al. 2011) remove primers dada2 R package (Callahan et al. 2016) compute ASVs. Samples less 1,000 reads processing considered. Assignment done dada2 assignTaxa using 18S PR2 4.14.0 reference ASVs less 100 reads total bootstrap value supergroup level < 75 considered. possible use either ASVs clustered ASVs (default option). ASVs clustered 100% identity VSEARCH --cluster_fast --id 1.00. See metaPR2 paper information. Total read number per sample normalized 100 3 decimals value displayed different panels correspond % total eukaryotic reads. number reads given ASV given sample divided total number reads sample multiplied 100.

title: Data processing
text: Callahan, B.J., McMurdie, P.J., Rosen, M.J., Han, .W., Johnson, .J.., Holmes, S.P., 2016. DADA2: High-resolution sample inference Illumina amplicon data. Nature Methods 13, 581–583. https://doi.org/10.1038/nmeth.3869 Martin, M., 2011. Cutadapt removes adapter sequences high-throughput sequencing reads. EMBnet.journal 17, 10. https://doi.org/10.14806/ej.17.1.200

title: Datasets
code: gene_region: V4 DNA_RNA: DNA ecosystem: - oceanic - coastal substrate: water fraction_name: - pico - total depth_level: - surface - euphotic - mesopelagic - bathypelagic datasets_selected_id: - '35' - '34' - '1' - '3' - '2' - '206' - '205' reads_min: 100

title: Diversity
text: can: compute different indices display violin plot using discrete variable y-axis. Change y axis. choose continuous variable (depth, latitude, temperature, salinity), can choose discretize intervals. Change color points (continuous variables) Change shape points (discrete variables) Fig. 1A: Alpha diversity: continuous y axis Fig. 1B: Alpha diversity: discrete y-axis

title: Diversity
text: can: Use different methods distances Change x axis Change color points (continuous variables) Change shape points (discrete variables) Fig. 2: Beta diversity samples.  Fig. 3: Bata diversity taxa phyloseq object structure.

title: Diversity
text: McMurdie, P.J., Holmes, S., 2013. Phyloseq: R Package Reproducible Interactive Analysis Graphics Microbiome Census Data. PLoS ONE 8, e61217. https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pone.0061217

title: Query
text: can use sequence (Micromonas) test functionality.

title: Select data
text: possible level (supergroup, division, class, order, family, genus, species, asv_code) select 1 groups. order update plots, need press Validate button. can also completely reset taxonomy selection using Reset button followed Validate button. possible save reload choices made. taxonomy saved (yaml) file.

title: Select data
code: level: asv_code name: - ec4282114f - edef1142c8 - 8b130de34f supergroup: Archaeplastida division: Chlorophyta class: Mamiellophyceae order: Mamiellales family: Mamiellaceae genus: Micromonas species: Micromonas_polaris asv_code: - ec4282114f - edef1142c8 - 8b130de34f taxa_excluded: Streptophyta

previous_headings: A database of 18S rRNA metabarcodes > Acessing the database
title: An R package for interactive access to metaPR2 database
text: 1 - Install package GitHub Note: may install packages required metapr2 installed machine Alternatively can also install R-universe without installing package devetools 2 - Launch shiny interface function run_app()
code: install.packages(devtools)  devtools::install_github("pr2database/metapr2-shiny") # Enable repository from pr2database options(repos = c(   pr2database = 'https://pr2database.r-universe.dev',   CRAN = 'https://cloud.r-project.org'))  # Download and install metapr2 in R install.packages('metapr2') metapr2::run_app()

text: Arctic - 2012 (Kilias 2020) Amundsen_Sea ASPIRE cruise - 2010-2011 Fram Strait - 2014 Palmer Station Antarctic - LTER - 2014 Arctic Scotian Shelf - 2009-2011 Baffin Bay - 2008-2018 Southern Ocean - 2017 Fram observatory 2016 Antarctic Peninsula - 2012-2016

title: metapr2 1.0.4
text: option now provided use either ASVs clustered ASVs welcome screen. ASVs clustered 100% identity VSEARCH –id 1.00 See metaPR2 paper information. also possible use version 1.0 database entering v1 welcome screen.

title: metapr2 1.0.4
text: new panel provides table taxa present current metaPR2 version number ASV species. table can easily searched.

title: metapr2 1.0.4
text: Information database provided left panel New button disconnect application reloading. Maximum number samples Phyloseq: 2000. Taxonomy constructed samples samples selected. Option use clustered ASVs Welcome panel. Barplots. right side graph indicates, parameter range, number samples fall range well number samples contain taxa selected.
